topics.body:
Dear diary:
You know what I fucking hate beyond anything in the world?

People that don't listen/people that go "oh your opinion is biased so therefore you're wrong"/"well you're be a <ass/aggressive> so therefore you're wrong"/etc when it's something fucking important.

Why are some people so dense as to not fucking listen whenever it comes to shit I DO actually know?

The difference between a water moccassin and a rat snake is that a water moccassin is fater and when it's brown instead of black it has stripes that go all around it's body whereas a rat snake have more along the lines of circles on it's back; water moccassin have flatter heads and rat snakes have more round heads.

Nobody's bit; it just annoys the utter fucking crap out of me whenever someone doesn't listen.  I don't mean to sound egotistical or misanthropic here, but sometimes I wonder how the human race lasted this long considering how fucking stupid some people act.  If I say don't touch that fucking snake cause it's NOT a rat snake don't fucking touch the god damn snake you stupid fucker.

Tl:dr; god some people are stupid.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558240c863687270fc00003b#post_558240c863687270fc00003b
Lo peor del asunto es que todo eso está "basado" aunque uso esa palabra muuuuuuy generosamente con esa gentuza (en particular con esos enfermos que toman el sidral al tiempo) en la teoría económica del liberalismo (sin neo porque eso es  muy de amlo) que ellos no entienden ni entenderán jamás pues son sólo tarados con traje que defenderán a capa y espada eso sin saber ni que es. Y si intentas siquiera sugerir que algo puede ir mal en eso pues te habrás desvelado como el más terrible de los especímenes, un chairo.
